pullRequest.title: Colony flag banners
pullRequest.bodyText:
Changes proposed in this pull request:

Added a custom banner picker window to select pattern designs, accessible from the town hall gui
Added the colony flag banner custom banner blocks (one normal, one for walls)

Can right click on a banner with a colony flag banner to copy its design as a default
Colony flag banner displays the colony flag set in the town hall, or the default if none was set (or there is no colony)
Each banner renders a small solid substitution block in the center while in creative mode, to tell them apart from normal banners.
Guards now apply the banner patterns for the colony flag to their shields (only updated when blocking, though)



Review please

commit.message:
Create the colony flag banner picker

Add a button in the settings menu of Town Hall GUI
Add custom banner selection GUI
Read and write the flag as a list of patterns

Create the colony banner objects

For tighter manipulation of defaults, new blocks and an entity are needed
Apply the flag to shields when wielded

Add docs and persist the colony flag

Ensures that the banner displays the colony flag even when the colony is not loaded
Separated the ColorPalette to its own file for potential re-use

Merge branch 'version/1.15' of https://github.com/ShadowProtocol/minecolonies into feature/colonyflags
